docs.snippet: Josh Beckett transformed himself from power pitcher to deceptive hurler after a winless, injury-plagued season ended with surgery....
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett transformed himself from power pitcher to deceptive hurler after a winless, injury-plagued season ended with surgery.

headline.main: Beckett Pitches No-Hitter, Dodgers Stop Phillies
headline.print_headline: Beckett Pitches No-Hitter, Dodgers Stop Phillies

docs.snippet: For the game studio Ubisoft, the release of Watch Dogs on Tuesday will begin to answer whether a five-year, $150 million investment was worthwhile....
docs.lead_paragraph: For the game studio Ubisoft, the release of Watch Dogs on Tuesday will begin to answer whether a five-year, $150 million investment was worthwhile.
docs.abstract: Ubisoft is set to release video game Watch Dogs after months of delay; does not expect postponed release to hurt sales and hopes intricate, complex game will spawn lucrative sequels.

docs.snippet: Sticker-based apps like Line and WeChat have transformed mobile messaging in Asia, but they have been slow to catch on in North America....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sticker-based apps like Line and WeChat have transformed mobile messaging in Asia, but they have been slow to catch on in North America.
docs.abstract: Sticker-based messaging apps like Line and WeChat are jostling for control of rapidly growing mobile messaging business; start-ups are racing to define how younger generation, one that has increasingly moved away from traditional text messaging, as well as Facebook and Twitter, will message on the go.

headline.main: No Time to Text? Say It With Stickers
headline.print_headline: No Time to Text? Say It With Stickers
